text: 1. One C.K =3NF & BCNF 2. NO Transitive Dependency = 3NF 3. Lossless decomposition— 2NF, 3NF, BCNF 4. No Lossy Decomposition - 2NF, 3NF, BCNF 5. Dependency Preserving - 2NF , 3NF 6. Not Always Dependency Preserving - BCNF 7. Rwithonly trivial FD — BCNF 8. BCNF =0 redundancy 9. If All are Prime Attributes = 2NF , 3NF 10. Binary Relation = BCNF 11. In Relational DB, Every Relation is in 1NF
